about.summary: Mapping Averaged Pairwise Information (MAPI) is an exploratory method providing graphical representations summarizing the spatial variation of pairwise metrics (eg. distance, similarity coefficient, ...) computed between georeferenced samples.

Mapping Averaged Pairwise Information (MAPI) is an exploratory method providing graphical representations summarizing the spatial variation of pairwise metrics (eg. distance, similarity coefficient, ...) computed between georeferenced samples.

name: r-mapi

about.summary: Mapping Averaged Pairwise Information (MAPI) is an exploratory method providing graphical representations summarizing the spatial variation of pairwise metrics (eg. distance, similarity coefficient, ...) computed between georeferenced samples.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.4" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mapi
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mapi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mapi/mapi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d28e76a687cf5762968d727bbdafdb5617e6e3ffc02656fe2f1d0b5df9c38a63

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  # If this is a new build for the same version, increment the build number.
  number: 1
  # skip windows builds
  skip: true  # [win]
  # This is required to make R link correctly on Linux.
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

# Suggests: dggridR, ggplot2, latticeExtra, progress, sp, testthat (>= 3.0.0)
requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("m2w64_c") }}          # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcpp
    - r-data.table
    - r-doparallel
    - r-fmesher
    - r-foreach
    - r-s2
    - r-sf

  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-rcpp
    - r-data.table
    - r-doparallel
    - r-fmesher
    - r-foreach
    - r-s2
    - r-sf

test:
  commands:
    # You can put additional test commands to be run here.
    - $R -e "library('mapi')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mapi')\""  # [win]

  # You can also put a file called run_test.r, run_test.py, run_test.sh,
  # or run_test.bat in the recipe that will be run at test time.

  # requires:
    # Put any additional test requirements here.

about:
  home: https://www1.montpellier.inrae.fr/CBGP/software/MAPI/
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: Mapping Averaged Pairwise Information (MAPI) is an exploratory method providing graphical representations summarizing the spatial variation of pairwise metrics (eg. distance, similarity coefficient, ...) computed between georeferenced samples.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - spiry34
